short_description.en: Rebate up to $2000 available based on Heat Pump SEER value.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $2,000 dólares según el valor SEER de la bomba de calor.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Heat Pump range from 15 SEER to greater than 17 SEER
other_restrictions: for greater than 15 SEER heat pumps, members will be required to submit a W-9. Rebate applications must be submitted within 365 days of unit installation

short_description.en: Rebate up to $2000 available based on Heat Pump SEER value.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $2,000 dólares según el valor SEER de la bomba de calor.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Heat Pump range from 15 SEER to greater than 17 SEER
other_restrictions: for greater than 15 SEER heat pumps, members will be required to submit a W-9. Rebate applications must be submitted within 365 days of unit installation

short_description.en: Rebate up to $2500 for residential photovolatic and wind system installation.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $2,500 dólares para sistemas fotovoltaicos y eólicos residenciales.

other_restrictions: Leased systems are not eligible for incentives

short_description.en: Rebate of $500 for each minimum usable capacity battery unit of 5 kWh, installed on or after Jan 9, 2022.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares por cada unidad de batería de 5 kWh de capacidad mínima utilizable instalada a partir del 9 de enero del 2022.

equipment_standards_restrictions: 5 kWh, minimum usable capacity battery unit with programable controls and/or have wi-fi capabilities and must not be charged during On-Peak periods
other_restrictions: rebate application must be accompanied by installation receipts and approved building permits

short_description.en: Up to $600 rebate for attic insulation installed by SRP insulation program contactor.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $600 dólares para aislamiento del ático instalado por un contratista del programa de aislamiento SRP.

equipment_standards_restrictions: based on improvement of existing insulation R-value; existing insulation with either an effective R-value less than R-19 or greater than R-19 with proof of underperformance that is improved to R-38 is eligible
other_restrictions: must be a current SRP residential electric customer who lives in a single-family detached or attached home or an apartment or condo; new construction and mobile homes are not eligible

short_description.en: $500 rebate for at least 2.8 UEW HPWH installed by contractor licensed in Arizona between July 1, 2023 and April 30, 2025.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 para un calentador de agua con bomba de calor y capacidad mínima de 2.8 instalado por un contratista de UEW certificado en Arizona entre el 1 de julio y el 30 de abril del 2024.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified HPWH that meets minimum efficiency ratings with a Uniform Energy Factor (UEF) of 2.8 or better
other_restrictions: must be permanent SRP residential electric customer who lives in a single-family detached home, single-family attached home, mobile home or apartment/condo; not available for new construction; installed in a home that has had permanent electric service from SRP for more than one year

short_description.en: Save $250 on a new Level 2 smart charger by shopping SRP Marketplace.
short_description.es: Ahorre $250 dólares en un nuevo cargador inteligente de nivel 2 comprando en SRP Marketplace.

short_description.en: Save $250 on a new Level 2 smart charger on or after Jan. 1, 2022, and submitted a rebate application within 90 days of purchase.
short_description.es: Ahorre $250 dólares en un nuevo cargador inteligente de nivel 2 a partir del 1 de enero de 2022 y presente una solicitud de reembolso en los 90 días siguientes a la compra.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Tesla Mobile Connector, Rivian Portable Charger and other portable chargers are not eligible
other_restrictions: Purchases through auction websites (Ebay, and others) are not eligible

short_description.en: $100 Rebate for Electric Storage Water Heater with a .93+ Uniform Energy Factor (UEF).
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $100 dólares para calentadores de agua eléctricos con un factor de energía uniforme (o UEF) de .93+.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Electric Storage Water Heater with a .93+ Uniform Energy Factor. Instantaneous (Tankless) units do not qualify
other_restrictions: complete within 60 days of installation or mail/drop off the information to your local SSVEC office

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric package heat pump with a 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para bombas de calor con sistema eléctrico integral de 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 como mínimo.

equipment_standards_restrictions: must have a 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 minimum rating

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric split system heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para todas las bombas de calor eléctricas de sistema dividido con una calificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2.

equipment_standards_restrictions: must have a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating

short_description.en: $500 rebate for all electric ductless heat pump with a minimum 2 tons and must have 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $500 dólares para todas las bombas de calor eléctricas sin ductos de un mínimo de 2 toneladas y una calificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2.

equipment_standards_restrictions: minimum 2 tons and must have a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating

short_description.en: $200 rebate for an electric heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating paired with a gas furnace with minimum 81% efficiency.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $200 dólares para una bomba de calor eléctrica con una clasificación mínima de 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 combinada con un calefactor de gas de una eficiencia mínima del 81%.

equipment_standards_restrictions: electric heat pump with 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum paired with a gas furnace with minimum 81% efficiency
other_restrictions: The outside thermistor must be set at 30 degrees with a contractor’s signature verifying that

short_description.en: Up to $900 rebate for heat pump quality installation.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $900 dólares por la instalación de una bomba de calor de calidad.

short_description.en: Weatherization improvements for homes for limited-income customers.
short_description.es: Mejoras de climatización para viviendas de clientes con ingresos limitados.

short_description.en: $400 rebate for TEP residential customers who purchase and install an Energy Star HPWH equipped with a wireless, programmable controller.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $400 dólares para los clientes residenciales de TEP que compren e instalen un calentador de agua con bomba de calor Energy Star equipado con un temporizador/controlador inalámbrico y programable.

equipment_standards_restrictions: new heat pump water heater with a timer/controller, either included with the unit or purchased and installed separately in this calendar year; timer/controller must be connected to Wi-Fi with a strong signal strength; Program the timer/controller to not operate during on-peak hours of 3–7 p.m
contractor_restrictions: must be installed by a licensed installer, who must provide proof that the work was properly permitted
other_restrictions: product must be purchased from a local retailer, the TEP Marketplace or an online retailer, not to include eBay or other resale sites, that ships the item to the customer’s service address in TEP’s territory; Allow a TEP representative to visit and enter your property to verify program requirements are met

short_description.en: Assistance available for energy efficient retrofitting to homes of income-qualifying customers.
short_description.es: Reacondicionamiento para la eficiencia energética en hogares de clientes que cumplen nivel de ingresos.

short_description.en: Up to $450 rebate for an Energy Star heat pump/AC purchase and installation through a qualified contractor.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de hasta $450 dólares por la compra e instalación de una bomba de calor.

contractor_restrictions: licensed UES Efficient Home Program participating contractors

short_description.en: Rebate of up to $1,125 back on initial investment for qualifying energy-efficient central AC units, heat pumps or heat pump mini splits.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Only SEER2 systems
15 or higher are eligible

short_description.en: Up to $100 off your bill when you allow your thermostat to automatically adjust a few degress higher during periods of high demand.

other_restrictions: Must be SRP residential electric cusomter

short_description.en: Up to $400 off of duct testing and qualified repair costs, or 75% of costs.

contractor_restrictions: Tests and repairs must be completed by a BPI-certified contractor
other_restrictions: Must be SRP residential electric customer

short_description.en: A rebate of $0.30 / square foot (up to $600) on installed cool roofing material.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Products must have a CRRC 3-year Solar Reflectance Index of greater than or equal to 86, or an initial solar reflectance number greater than or equal to 0.83, or a 3-year SRI greater than or equal to 0.70
other_restrictions: Must be SRP residential electric customer, new construction homes and installations over non-inhabitable spaces of the home do not qualify

short_description.en: $1/square foot rebate on professionally installed shade screens or window film.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Shade screens must block at least 80% of solar heat gain on sunstruck windows only, install screens on the exterior of clear glass windows that enclost an air-conditioned space
other_restrictions: Must be permanent SRP residential electric cusomter and live in a single-family detached, attached or mobile home or an apartment/condo

short_description.en: Rebate of $3/square foot on professionally installed ENERGY STAR rated replacement windows.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR rated windows with a U-factor of less than or equal to 0.32 and a SHGC of less than or equal to 0.23.
other_restrictions: Must be a permanent SRP residential electric cusomter living in a single-family detached home, mobile home or condominium/townhouse.

short_description.en: Up to $100 rebate on an in-person Home Energy Audit by an independent Home Performance contractor.

contractor_restrictions: Energy audit must be performed by a participating BPI-certified professional who is licensed in Arizona and included on the SRP list of available contractors in the audit program.
other_restrictions: Must be a current SRP residential electric customer who lives in a single-family detached or attached home or apartment/condo.

short_description.en: $250 rebate on the purchase and installation of a demand installation system, available for SRP customers installing a new rooftop solar system.

contractor_restrictions: Solar system must be installed by an SRP preferred solar installer.
other_restrictions: Limited to one rebate per household.

short_description.en: Up to $750 rebate for air conditioner quality installation.

contractor_restrictions: Must use a participating Efficient Home Program contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $300 rebate on duct sealing (varies based on actual leakage reduced).

contractor_restrictions: Must use a participating Efficient Home Program contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $120/ton rebate on mini split heat pump or air conditioner.

contractor_restrictions: Must use a participating Efficient Home Program contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $175 rebate on AC tuneup, including refrigerant charge repair, indoor coil cleaning, and outdoor coil cleaning.

contractor_restrictions: Must use a participating Efficient Home Program contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $35 rebate for qualified smart thermostat.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must come from list of qualified thermostats.
other_restrictions: For TEP residential customers only.

short_description.en: Up to $375 rebate for air conditioner quality installation.

contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by licensed UniSource Efficient Home Program participating contractors.

short_description.en: Up to $150 rebate on duct sealing, varies based on actual leakage reduced.

contractor_restrictions: Work must be performed by licensed UniSource Efficient Home Program participating contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $200 on AC tuneup, including refrigerant charge repair, indoor coil cleaning, and outdoor coil cleaning.

contractor_restrictions: Work must be performed by licensed UniSource Efficient Home Program participating contractor.

short_description.en: Rebate of %60 per unit for recycled refrigerators or freezers.

other_restrictions: Limit of two refrigerator or freezer recycle rebates per consumer per year. Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: $30 rebate for non-heat pump clothes dryers, $90 rebate per unit for a vent-less heat pump clothes dryer.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR rated.
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: $100 rebate for electric-to-induction range replacements, $350 for gas-to-induction range replacement or new construction. Must be 30" or larger.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: $25 rebate for smart thermostats.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR rated.
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $250/ton off ductless air-source heat pumps, up to 5 tons. Cannot exceed 50% of equipment cost.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR version 6.1, minimum standard 7.8 HSPF2
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $500/ton off ductless air source cold-climate pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity. Cannot exceed 50% of equipment cost.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR version 6.1 cold climate. 8.5 HSPF2, 70% capacity and COP of 1.75 at 5P.
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $250/ton off ducted air source cold-climate heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $125/ton for additional capacity. $500 bonus for propane dual-fuel.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR version 6.1 minimum standard 7.8 HSPF2
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $500/ton off ducted cold-climate air source heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity. $500 bonus for propane dual-fuel.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR version 6.1 cold climate. 8.1 HSPF2, 70% capacity and COP of 1.75 at 5P.
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $500/ton off of air to water heat pumps, up to 5 tons. $250/ton for additional capacity over 5 tons.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate for $500/ton off of new ground source heat pump systems. $250/ton for replacement systems. $100 per unit for hot water systems.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: $100 rebate for replacement or new installation of a whole house fan.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member. Limit of 2 whole house fans per member account.

short_description.en: $200 rebate for replacement or new installation of an evaporative cooler.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member. Limit of 2 evaporative coolers per member account.

short_description.en: $100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR rated split system air-conditioning unit.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR rated, minimum 16 SEER or 15.2 SEER 2, minimum size of 1 ton.
other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member. Window and/or portable units do not qualify.

short_description.en: 25-50% rebate on electric outdoor power equipment with caps up to $5,000, dependent on the technology.,.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate of 25% of the cost of an electric bicycle, up to $150.

other_restrictions: Must be a CEC active member.

short_description.en: Rebate of $150 per smart thermostat, up to two units.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR certified and listed on the Approved Smart Thermostats list.
other_restrictions: Must be a Dixie Power Member with current residential service. Must be signed up on the Time of Day Optional Rate.

short_description.en: Rebate of $200/ton for electric heat pumps with electric backup or dual fuel, and ground source heat pumps (with electric backup).

equipment_standards_restrictions: 14 SEER minimum, 2-ton minimum.

short_description.en: Rebate up to $1,475 for a 400 amp service. Available when providing the installation of an all-electric or hybrid heat pump necesitates the service.
Up to $300 rebate for air duct repair.

other_restrictions: New homes are not eligible.

short_description.en: Up to $150 rebate on an ENERGY STAR variable speed pool pump.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR rated.

short_description.en: Up to $250 rebate on a Level 2 EV charger.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be Level 2 charger.

short_description.en: Rebate of 50% of the cost of attic insulation, up to $300.
Rebate of up to $250 for replacing current water heater with a heat pump water heater.

other_restrictions: Unit cannot be used, re-furbished, or leased.

short_description.en: Rebate of up to $500 for an energy efficient HVAC unit. Rebate increases depending on SEER rating.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Minimum 15.2 SEER 2.
contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by a licensed contractor.

short_description.en: Up to $100 rebate for an ENERGY STAR certified induction cooktop/stove.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR certified.

short_description.en: Up to $50 rebate for a smart thermostat.

other_restrictions: Limit two per ED3 residential account.

short_description.en: Up to $0.80/square foot rebate for solar shade screens.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must block at least 80% of the solar heat gain.
other_restrictions: Must be installed on the south, east, or west side of home.

short_description.en: Up to $50 rebate for ENERGY STAR certified, electric washer/dryer.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR certified and electric.

short_description.en: Up to $400/ton rebate for energy efficient heat pumps and groundwater source heat pumps.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Minimum 16 SEER for less than 65,000 btu/hr or 13 SEER for greater than 65,000 btu/hr.

short_description.en: $350 rebate on all qualified heat pump water heaters.
Free virtual energy checkup from an Arizona Public Service energy advisor. Can also pay $99 for an in-person home performance checkup.
$250 rebate for duct repair and sealing.
$250 rebate for instulation - attic, walls, crawl spaces, etc.
$50 rebate for a qualified home energy monitor.
$200 rebate for a water heater timer.

other_restrictions: Limit of 2 devices per household

short_description.en: $30 rebate for a qualifying smart thermostat. Get an additional $85 rebate on select thermostats when you enroll in APS's Cool Rewards program.
$200 rebate for replacing an old or broken air conditioner with a new one. Customers enrolled in the Energy Support program can get up to $1,200.
Air-conditioning replacement program through Community Action Agencies across Arizona, 100% of project cost available for households under 80% AMI.
Air-conditioning replacement program through Community Action Agencies, 50% of project costs available for households between 80% and 150% AMI.
Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater costs for households below 80% AMI, up to $1,750.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified
other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

short_description.en: Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $1,750.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified
other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

short_description.en: Rebate of 100% of ENERGY STAR air source heat pump costs for households below 80% AMI, up to $8,000.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified
other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

short_description.en: Rebate of 50% of ENERGY STAR air source heat pump costs for households between 80% and 150% AMI, up to $8,000.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified
other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000

other_restrictions: Total rebates received from HEAR program cannot exceed $14,000
